text: aur agar usako koee takaleeph pahunch jaane ke baad ham usako apanee rahamat ka maza chakhaen to yaqeenee kahane lagata hai ki ye to mere lie hee hai aur main nahin khayaal karata ki kabhee qayaamat barapa hogee aur agar (qayaamat ho bhee aur) main apane paravaradigaar kee taraf lautaaya bhee jaoon to bhee mere lie yaqeenan usake yahaan bhalaee hee to hai jo aamaal karate rahe ham unako (qayaamat mein) zaroor bata dengen aur unako sakht azaab ka maza chakhaegen
